diegetic.text.compass.missing_lodestone: §fLodestone is in another dimension or was destroyed.
diegetic.text.recovery_compass.unknown_d: §7Last death location is in another dimension or does not exist.
gamerule.diegeticClockUsesServerTime: If clocks are enabled, clocks will display the server's (IRL) time.
gamerule.diegeticLodestoneCompassRelativ: Compasses associated with lodestones will provide relative coordinates to their lodestone.
gamerule.diegeticRecoveryCompassRelative: Recovery-compasses will provide relate coordinates to last known death location.
gamerule.diegeticSlimeChunkChecking: Slimeballs can inform if one's current chunk is a slime chunk.
